import React,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import './About.css'; import 'animate.css' const About=()=>{ const [bgColour, setBgColour] = useState("linear-gradient(to right, #000000 0%, #ffffff 100%)") const [fcolor,setfcolor]=useState("yellow") const styles={ background:`${bgColour}`, color:`${fcolor}` } function handlechange(){ setBgColour("black") setfcolor("yellow") } function change(){ setBgColour("linear-gradient(to right, #000000 0%, #ffffff 100%)") setfcolor("rgb(8, 92, 2)") } return(

always eager to learn something new :)

KNOW ME MORE !

); } export default About;
